course_title: Mapping SÃ£o Paulo Through the Arts (Intermediate Portuguese)
class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 28- June 24, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: This course aims to further develop communication skills in Portuguese and expand knowledge of Brazilian cultural traditions. The course is designed so as to dialogically interweave the arts and language acquisition. The students will be exposed to a vast array of meaningful artistic productions.
prerequisites: PORT 102 or PORT 110 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
